docs.snippet: Versions of Super Bowl ads are already online, in stark contrast to a decades-old strategy of building anticipation by keeping them under wraps until the game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Versions of Super Bowl ads are already online, in stark contrast to a decades-old strategy of building anticipation by keeping them under wraps until the game.
docs.abstract: Advertising column observes that versions of Super Bowl XLVII ads are already online, in stark contrast to a decades-old strategy of building anticipation by keeping them under wraps until the game; points out marketers want additional attention for their products and services before the game, but some analysts criticize the new strategy.

headline.seo: Super Bowl Ad Previews Draw Online Attention, With Criticism
headline.main: Super Bowl Ad Previews Draw Online Attention, With Criticism

docs.snippet: Twenty-six children from Newtown, Conn., will perform at the Super Bowl in a tribute to those killed in a shooting massacre last month....
docs.abstract: Twenty-six children from Newtown, Conn., will perform at the Super Bowl in a tribute to those killed in a shooting massacre last month.

headline.main: Sandy Hook Elementary Children to Sing at  Super Bowl

docs.snippet: Seven years after Hurricane Katrina, the New Orleans neighborhood where Marshall Faulk grew up lags behind the city’s recovery....
docs.lead_paragraph: Seven years after Hurricane Katrina, the New Orleans neighborhood where Marshall Faulk grew up lags behind the city’s recovery.
docs.abstract: Neighborhood surrounding George Washington Carver High School in New Orleans remains wasteland, lagging behind the city's recovery nearly seven years after Hurricane Katrina; Hall of Fame running back Marshall Faulk, Carver High alumnus, reflects on area's continuing struggles while in town for Super Bowl.

headline.seo: In Super Bowl City, Scars Remain Where the Water Receded

keywords.value: George Washington Carver High School (New Orleans)
keywords.name: organizations

docs.snippet: The company introduced a new operating system and a new generation of phones, along with a new corporate name, with the hope of restoring its products’ status as a symbol of executive cool....
docs.lead_paragraph: The company introduced a new operating system and a new generation of phones, along with a new corporate name, with the hope of restoring its products’ status as a symbol of executive cool.
docs.abstract: Research In Motion introduces new operating system and new generation of phones, along with new corporate name BlackBerry 10, with hope of restoring its products’ status as symbol of executive cool; marketing change carries some risk; early reviews have been positive, but phones are late in arriving.

headline.seo: BlackBerry Maker Unveils Its New Line, and a New Name
headline.main: Amid Long Odds, BlackBerry Maker Unveils New Line and New Name
headline.print_headline: Amid Long Odds, BlackBerry Maker Unveils New Line and New Name

byline.contributor: William Alden and Brian X. Chen contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: Ralph Lauren sets the stage for its men’s wear and the C.F.D.A.’s flap about juice cleanses....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ralph Lauren sets the stage for its men’s wear and the C.F.D.A.’s flap about juice cleanses.
docs.abstract: Eric Wilson Front Row column; Ralph Lauren shows his men's wear fall collection weeks before New York Fashion Week; eating disorder specialists condemn Council of Fashion Designers of America for offering half-price Fashion Week discount for models at juice and health-food retailer Organic Avenue.

headline.seo: Front Row: Ralph Lauren Gets a Jump on Fashion Week
headline.main: An Early Trip to Ralph Lauren’s Land
headline.print_headline: An Early Trip to Ralph Lauren’s Land
